Product Features

White cotton T-shirt, classic design, with embroidered logo “AGH”. Made of high quality material. Made in Poland. Available in men’s and women’s styles.  

Product description  
size: women’s (from XS to XL), men’s (from S to XXL)  
type: T-shirt  
colour: white  
embroidery: different colours   
fabric: 100% cotton  
basic weight of fabric: 180 gsm
